ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Check that no unauthenticated repository is authorized by configuration
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Accessing a repository should be allowed only when the repository is authenticated.

ns3:criteria.comment: Detect any usage of allow-ynauthenticated option

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Ensure insecure_locks is disabled
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Allowing insecure file locking could allow for sensitive data to be viewed or edited by an unauthorized user.

ns3:criterion.comment: Check for insecure NFS locks in /etc/exports

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Require Client SMB Packet Signing, if using mount.cifs
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Require packet signing of clients who mount Samba shares using the mount.cifs program (e.g., those who specify shares in /etc/fstab). To do so, ensure that signing options (either sec=krb5i or sec=ntlmv2i) are used.

ns3:criterion.comment: check for sec=krb5i or sec=ntlmv2i in /etc/fstab
check for sec=krb5i or sec=ntlmv2i in /etc/mtab

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: SNMP default communities disabled
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: SNMP default communities must be removed.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: SNMP use newer protocols
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: SNMP version 1 and 2c must not be enabled.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Disable Host-Based Authentication
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: SSH host-based authentication should be disabled.

ns3:criteria.comment: SSH is configured correctly or is not installed
sshd is not installed

ns3:extend_definition.comment: sshd is not required or requirement is unset

ns3:criteria.comment: sshd is installed and configured

ns3:extend_definition.comment: sshd is required or requirement is unset

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Ensure Only Protocol 2 Connections Allowed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The OpenSSH daemon should be running protocol 2.

ns3:criteria.comment: SSH is configured correctly or is not installed
sshd is not installed

ns3:extend_definition.comment: sshd is not required or requirement is unset

ns3:criteria.comment: sshd is installed and configured

ns3:extend_definition.comment: sshd is required or requirement is unset

ns3:criteria.comment: SSH version is equal or higher than 7.4 or it is configured with protocol 2

ns3:extend_definition.comment: OpenSSH version 7.4 or higher supports only protocol 2

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Disable Empty Passwords
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Remote connections from accounts with empty passwords should be disabled (and dependencies are met)

ns3:criteria.comment: SSH is configured correctly or is not installed
sshd is not installed

ns3:extend_definition.comment: sshd is not required or requirement is unset

ns3:criteria.comment: sshd is installed and configured

ns3:extend_definition.comment: sshd is required or requirement is unset

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Disable SSH Support for Rhosts RSA Authentication
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: SSH can allow authentication through the obsolete rsh command through the use of the authenticating user's SSH keys. This should be disabled.

ns3:criteria.comment: SSH is configured correctly or is not installed
sshd is not installed

ns3:extend_definition.comment: sshd is not required or requirement is unset

ns3:criteria.comment: sshd is installed and configured

ns3:extend_definition.comment: sshd is required or requirement is unset

ns3:criteria.comment: SSH version is equal or higher than 7.4 has deprecated RhostsRSAAuthentication

ns3:extend_definition.comment: OpenSSH version 7.4 or higher has deprecated RhostsRSAAuthentication

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Disable root Login via SSH
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Root login via SSH should be disabled (and dependencies are met)

ns3:criteria.comment: SSH is configured correctly or is not installed
sshd is not installed

ns3:extend_definition.comment: sshd is not required or requirement is unset

ns3:criteria.comment: sshd is installed and configured

ns3:extend_definition.comment: sshd is required or requirement is unset

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Disable SSH Support for User Known Hosts
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: SSH can allow system users host-based authentication to connect to systems if a cache of the remote systems public keys are available. This should be disabled.

ns3:criteria.comment: SSH is configured correctly or is not installed
sshd is not installed

ns3:extend_definition.comment: sshd is not required or requirement is unset

ns3:criteria.comment: sshd is installed and configured

ns3:extend_definition.comment: sshd is required or requirement is unset

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Enable a Warning Banner
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: SSH warning banner should be enabled (and dependencies are met)

ns3:criteria.comment: SSH is configured correctly or is not installed
sshd is not installed

ns3:extend_definition.comment: sshd is not required or requirement is unset

ns3:criteria.comment: sshd is installed and configured

ns3:extend_definition.comment: sshd is required or requirement is unset

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Enable X11 Forwarding
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Enable X11Forwarding to encrypt X11 remote connections over SSH.

ns3:criteria.comment: SSH is configured correctly or is not installed
sshd is not installed

ns3:extend_definition.comment: sshd is not required or requirement is unset

ns3:criteria.comment: sshd is installed and configured

ns3:extend_definition.comment: sshd is required or requirement is unset

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Set OpenSSH Idle Timeout Interval
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The SSH idle timeout interval should be set to an appropriate value.

ns3:criteria.comment: SSH is configured correctly or is not installed
sshd is not installed

ns3:extend_definition.comment: sshd is not required or requirement is unset

ns3:criteria.comment: sshd is installed and configured

ns3:extend_definition.comment: sshd is required or requirement is unset

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Set ClientAliveCountMax for User Logins
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The SSH ClientAliveCountMax should be set to an appropriate value (and dependencies are met)

ns3:criteria.comment: SSH is configured correctly or is not installed
sshd is not installed

ns3:extend_definition.comment: sshd is not required or requirement is unset

ns3:criteria.comment: sshd is installed and configured

ns3:extend_definition.comment: sshd is required or requirement is unset

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Set OpenSSH LogLevel to INFO
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The SSH LogLevel should be set to INFO.

ns3:criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Set OpenSSH authentication attempt limit (MaxAuthTries)
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The SSH MaxAuthTries should be set to an appropriate value.

ns3:criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Lock out account after failed login attempts
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The number of allowed failed logins should be set correctly.

ns3:criteria.comment: Checks common to both scenarios

ns3:criterion.comment: pam_faillock.so preauth silent set in system-auth
pam_faillock.so set in account phase of system-auth
pam_faillock.so preauth silent set in password-auth
pam_faillock.so set in account phase of password-auth
Perform check if pam_faillock authfail follows pam_unix even with lines skipped
Perform check if pam_faillock authfail follows pam_unix with either sufficient or default=ignore
Perform check if pam_faillock authfail follows pam_unix even with lines skipped
pam_faillock.so authfail deny value set in password-auth

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Set All Accounts To Have Unique Names
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: All accounts on the system should have unique names for proper accountability.

ns3:criteria.comment: There should not exist duplicate user name entries in /etc/passwd

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Set Password Expiration Parameters
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The maximum password age policy should meet minimum requirements.

ns3:criteria.comment: The value PASS_MAX_DAYS should be set appropriately in /etc/login.defs

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Set Password Expiration Parameters
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The minimum password age policy should be set appropriately.

ns3:criteria.comment: The value of PASS_MIN_DAYS should be set appropriately in /etc/login.defs

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Set Password Expiration Parameters
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The password minimum length should be set appropriately.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Set Password Expiration Parameters
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The password expiration warning age should be set appropriately.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: All Password Hashes Shadowed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: All password hashes should be shadowed.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: No nullok Option in /etc/pam.d/system-auth
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The file /etc/pam.d/system-auth should not contain the nullok option

ns3:criterion.comment: make sure the nullok option is not used in /etc/pam.d/system-auth

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Verify No netrc Files Exist
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The .netrc files contain login information used to auto-login into FTP servers and reside in the user's home directory. Any .netrc files should be removed.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: UID 0 Belongs Only To Root
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Only the root account should be assigned a user id of 0.

ns3:criterion.comment: tests that there are no accounts with UID 0 except root in the /etc/passwd file

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Direct root Logins Not Allowed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Preventing direct root logins help ensure accountability for actions taken on the system using the root account.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: System Accounts Do Not Run a Shell
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The root account is the only system account that should have a login shell.

ns3:criterion.comment: Test shell defined for UID from <0, UID_MIN -1>
Test shell defined for reserved system UIDs
Test shell defined for dynamically allocated system UIDs

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Restrict Serial Port Root Logins
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Preventing direct root login to serial port interfaces helps ensure accountability for actions taken on the system using the root account.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Restrict Virtual Console Root Logins
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Preventing direct root login to virtual console devices helps ensure accountability for actions taken on the system using the root account.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Proper Permissions User Home Directories
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: File permissions should be set correctly for the home directories for all user accounts.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Write permissions are disabled for group and other in all directories in Root's Path
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Check each directory in root's path and make use it does not grant write permission to group and other

ns3:criteria.comment: Check that write permission to group and other in root's path is denied

ns3:criterion.comment: Check for write permission to group and other in root's path

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Verify /var/log/audit Ownership
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Checks that all /var/log/audit files and directories are owned by the root user and group.

ns3:criteria.comment: directories are root owned
log_group in auditd.conf is not root

ns3:extend_definition.comment: log_group in auditd.conf is not root

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Configure audispd Plugin Remote Server IP address or Hostname
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: remote_server setting in /etc/audisp/audisp-remote.conf is set to a certain IP address or hostname

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Kerberos 5 Authentication and Encryption in Audit Event Multiplexor (audispd) Is Activated
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: enable_krb5 setting in /etc/audisp/audisp-remote.conf is set to 'yes'

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: The syslog Plugin Of the Audit Event Multiplexor (audispd) Is Activated
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: active setting in /etc/audisp/plugins.d/syslog.conf is set to 'yes'

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Auditd Action to Take When Disk Errors
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: disk_error_action setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to a certain action

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Auditd Action to Take When Disk Is Full
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: disk_full_action setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to a certain action

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Auditd Email Account to Notify Upon Action
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: action_mail_acct setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to a certain account

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Auditd Action to Take When Disk is Low on Space
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: admin_space_left_action setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to a certain action

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Auditd Maximum Log File Size
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: max_log_file setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to at least a certain value

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Auditd Action to Take When Maximum Log Size Reached
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: max_log_file_action setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to a certain action

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Auditd Maximum Number of Logs to Retain
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: num_logs setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to at least a certain value

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Configure auditd space_left on Low Disk Space
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: space_left setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to at least a certain value

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Auditd Action to Take When Disk Starting to Run Low on Space
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: space_left_action setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to a certain action

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Verify the UEFI Boot Loader grub.cfg Group Owner
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Verify that UEFI Boot Loader grub.cfg is group owned by 0.

ns3:extend_definition.comment: Pass if system boot mode is not UEFI

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Verify /boot/grub2/grub.cfg Group Owner
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Verify that /boot/grub2/grub.cfg is group owned by gid 0.

ns3:extend_definition.comment: Pass if system boot mode is UEFI

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Verify the UEFI Boot Loader grub.cfg Owner
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Verify that UEFI Boot Loader grub.cfg is owned by uid 0.

ns3:extend_definition.comment: Pass if system boot mode is not UEFI

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Verify /boot/grub2/grub.cfg Owner
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Verify that /boot/grub2/grub.cfg is owned by uid 0.

ns3:extend_definition.comment: Pass if system boot mode is UEFI

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Verify /boot/grub2/grub.cfg Mode Permissions
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: File permissions for /boot/grub2/grub.cfg should be set to 0600 (or stronger).

ns3:extend_definition.comment: Pass if system boot mode is UEFI

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Force IOMMU usage in GRUB2
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Look for argument iommu=force in the kernel line in /etc/default/grub.

ns3:criterion.comment: check for iommu=force in /etc/default/grub via GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_DEFAULT
check for iommu=force in /etc/default/grub via GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Confirm Existence and Permissions of System Log Files
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: All syslog log files should be owned by the appropriate group.

ns3:extend_definition.comment: rsyslog daemon is used as local logging daemon

ns3:criterion.comment: Check if all system log files are owned by root group

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Confirm Existence and Permissions of System Log Files
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: All syslog log files should be owned by the appropriate user.

ns3:criterion.comment: Check if all system log files are owned by root user

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Confirm Existence and Permissions of System Log Files
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: File permissions for all syslog log files should be set correctly.

ns3:extend_definition.comment: rsyslog daemon is used as local logging daemon

ns3:criterion.comment: Check permissions of all system log files

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Ensure the logrotate utility performs the automatic rotation of log files on daily basis
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The frequency of automatic log files rotation performed by the logrotate utility should be configured to run daily

ns3:criteria.comment: /etc/logrotate.conf contains daily setting and /etc/cron.daily/logrotate file exists

ns3:criterion.comment: Check if daily is set in /etc/logrotate.conf
Check if /etc/cron.daily/logrotate file exists (and calls logrotate)

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Send Logs to a Remote Loghost
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Syslog logs should be sent to a remote loghost

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Disable IPv6 Kernel Module Functionality via Disable Option
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The disable option will allow the IPv6 module to be inserted, but prevent address assignment and activation of the network stack.

ns3:criterion.comment: ipv6 disabled any modprobe conf file

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Verify that System.map files are readable only by root
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Checks that /boot/System.map-* are only readable by root.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Add nodev Option to Non-Root Local Partitions
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The nodev mount option prevents files from being interpreted as character or block devices. Legitimate character and block devices should exist in the /dev directory on the root partition or within chroot jails built for system services. All other locations should not allow character and block devices.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Bind Mount /var/tmp To /tmp
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The /var/tmp directory should be bind mounted to /tmp in order to consolidate temporary storage into one location protected by the same techniques as /tmp.

ns3:criterion.comment: Ensure /var/tmp is configured to bind mount to /tmp
Ensure /var/tmp and /tmp have the same source device

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Package Antivirus Installed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Antivirus software should be installed.

ns3:criteria.comment: Antivirus is not being used or conditions are met

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Package McAfeeVSEForLinux Installed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: McAfee Antivirus software should be installed.

ns3:criteria.comment: Antivirus is not being used or conditions are met

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Install the McAfee Runtime Libraries and Linux Agent
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Install the McAfee Runtime Libraries (MFErt) and Linux Agent (MFEcma).

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: McAfee AntiVirus Definitions Updated
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Verify that McAfee AntiVirus definitions have been updated.

ns3:criterion.comment: Check if McAfee AntiVirus definitions have been updated

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Install the Asset Configuration Compliance Module (ACCM)
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Install the Asset Configuration Compliance Module (ACCM).

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Install the Host Intrusion Prevention System (HIPS) Module
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Install the McAfee Host Intrusion Prevention System (HIPS) Module if it is absolutely necessary. If SELinux is enabled, do not install or enable this module.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Install the Policy Auditor (PA) Module
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Install the Policy Auditor (PA) Module.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Ensure !authenticate Is Not Used in Sudo
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Checks sudo usage without authentication

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Ensure NOPASSWD Is Not Used in Sudo
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Checks sudo usage without password

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Ensure Users Re-Authenticate for Privilege Escalation - sudo
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Checks sudo usage without password

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Ensure apt_get gpgcheck Globally Activated
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The gpgcheck option should be used to ensure that checking of an RPM package's signature always occurs prior to its installation.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Verify /etc/group Group Owner
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: This test makes sure that /etc/group is group owned by 0.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Verify /etc/gshadow Group Owner
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: This test makes sure that /etc/gshadow is group owned by 42.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Verify /etc/passwd Group Owner
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: This test makes sure that /etc/passwd is group owned by 0.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Verify /etc/shadow Group Owner
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: This test makes sure that /etc/shadow is group owned by 42.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Verify /etc/group Owner
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: This test makes sure that /etc/group is owned by 0.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Verify /etc/gshadow Owner
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: This test makes sure that /etc/gshadow is owned by 0.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Verify /etc/passwd Owner
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: This test makes sure that /etc/passwd is owned by 0.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Verify /etc/shadow Owner
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: This test makes sure that /etc/shadow is owned by 0.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Verify /etc/group Mode Permissions
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: This test makes sure that /etc/group has mode 0644. If the target file or directory has an extended ACL, then it will fail the mode check.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Verify /etc/gshadow Mode Permissions
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: This test makes sure that /etc/gshadow has mode 0640. If the target file or directory has an extended ACL, then it will fail the mode check.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Verify /etc/passwd Mode Permissions
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: This test makes sure that /etc/passwd has mode 0644. If the target file or directory has an extended ACL, then it will fail the mode check.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Verify /etc/shadow Mode Permissions
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: This test makes sure that /etc/shadow has mode 0640. If the target file or directory has an extended ACL, then it will fail the mode check.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Add nodev Option to /home
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: /home should be mounted with mount option nodev.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Add nosuid Option to /home
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: /home should be mounted with mount option nosuid.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Add nodev Option to /tmp
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: /tmp should be mounted with mount option nodev.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Add nosuid Option to /tmp
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: /tmp should be mounted with mount option nosuid.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Add nodev Option to /usr
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: /usr should be mounted with mount option nodev.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Add nodev Option to /var/lib
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: /var/lib should be mounted with mount option nodev.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Add nosuid Option to /var/lib
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: /var/lib should be mounted with mount option nosuid.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Add nodev Option to /var/log
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: /var/log should be mounted with mount option nodev.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Add noexec Option to /var/log
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: /var/log should be mounted with mount option noexec.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Add nosuid Option to /var/log
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: /var/log should be mounted with mount option nosuid.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Add nodev Option to /var
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: /var should be mounted with mount option nodev.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Add noexec Option to /var
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: /var should be mounted with mount option noexec.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Add nosuid Option to /var
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: /var should be mounted with mount option nosuid.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Package auditd Installed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The DPKG package auditd should be installed.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Package cron Installed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The DPKG package cron should be installed.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Package inetutils-telnetd Removed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The DPKG package inetutils-telnetd should be removed.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Package net-snmp Removed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The DPKG package net-snmp should be removed.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Package nis Removed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The DPKG package nis should be removed.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Package ntp Installed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The DPKG package ntp should be installed.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Package ntpd Installed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The DPKG package ntpd should be installed.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Package ntpdate Removed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The DPKG package ntpdate should be removed.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Package openssh-server Installed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The DPKG package openssh-server should be installed.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Package openssh-server Removed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The DPKG package openssh-server should be removed.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Package rsh-client Removed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The DPKG package rsh-client should be removed.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Package rsyslog Installed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The DPKG package rsyslog should be installed.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Package syslogng Installed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The DPKG package syslogng should be installed.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Package talkd Removed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The DPKG package talkd should be removed.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Package telnetd-ssl Removed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The DPKG package telnetd-ssl should be removed.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Package telnetd Removed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The DPKG package telnetd should be removed.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Ensure /home Located On Separate Partition
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: If stored locally, create a separate partition for /home. If /home will be mounted from another system such as an NFS server, then creating a separate partition is not necessary at this time, and the mountpoint can instead be configured later.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Ensure /srv Located On Separate Partition
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: If stored locally, create a separate partition for /srv. If /srv will be mounted from another system such as an NFS server, then creating a separate partition is not necessary at this time, and the mountpoint can instead be configured later.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Ensure /tmp Located On Separate Partition
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: If stored locally, create a separate partition for /tmp. If /tmp will be mounted from another system such as an NFS server, then creating a separate partition is not necessary at this time, and the mountpoint can instead be configured later.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Ensure /var Located On Separate Partition
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: If stored locally, create a separate partition for /var. If /var will be mounted from another system such as an NFS server, then creating a separate partition is not necessary at this time, and the mountpoint can instead be configured later.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Ensure /var/log Located On Separate Partition
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: If stored locally, create a separate partition for /var/log. If /var/log will be mounted from another system such as an NFS server, then creating a separate partition is not necessary at this time, and the mountpoint can instead be configured later.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Ensure /var/log/audit Located On Separate Partition
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: If stored locally, create a separate partition for /var/log/audit. If /var/log/audit will be mounted from another system such as an NFS server, then creating a separate partition is not necessary at this time, and the mountpoint can instead be configured later.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Ensure Correct Mode, Owner, Group Owner for /etc/group
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Checks for correct UNIX permissions on /etc/group.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Ensure Correct Mode, Owner, Group Owner for /etc/gshadow
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Checks for correct UNIX permissions on /etc/gshadow.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Ensure Correct Mode, Owner, Group Owner for /etc/passwd
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Checks for correct UNIX permissions on /etc/passwd.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Ensure Correct Mode, Owner, Group Owner for /etc/shadow
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Checks for correct UNIX permissions on /etc/shadow.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Service auditd Enabled
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The auditd service should be enabled if possible.

ns3:criteria.comment: package auditd installed and service auditd is configured to start
service auditd is configured to start and is running
service auditd is configured to start

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Service cron Enabled
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The cron service should be enabled if possible.

ns3:criteria.comment: package cron installed and service cron is configured to start
service cron is configured to start and is running
service cron is configured to start

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Service ntp Enabled
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The ntp service should be enabled if possible.

ns3:criteria.comment: package ntp installed and service ntp is configured to start
service ntp is configured to start and is running
service ntp is configured to start

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Service rsyslog Enabled
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The rsyslog service should be enabled if possible.

ns3:criteria.comment: package rsyslog installed and service rsyslog is configured to start
service rsyslog is configured to start and is running
service rsyslog is configured to start

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Service sshd Disabled
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The sshd service should be disabled if possible.

ns3:criteria.comment: package openssh-server removed or service sshd is not configured to start
service sshd is not configured to start

ns3:criterion.comment: sshd socket not wanted by multi-user.target

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Service syslogng Enabled
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The syslogng service should be enabled if possible.

ns3:criteria.comment: package syslogng installed and service syslogng is configured to start
service syslogng is configured to start and is running
service syslogng is configured to start

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: OpenSSH Server is 7.4 or newer
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Check if version of OpenSSH Server is equal or higher than 7.4

ns3:criteria.comment: OpenSSH Server version is equal or higher than 7.4
System uses RPM based packages
System uses RPM based packages

ns3:criterion.comment: Check RPM OpenSSH Server is equal or higher than 7.4

ns3:criteria.comment: System uses DEB based packages
System uses RPM based packages

ns3:criterion.comment: Check DEB version of OpenSSH Server is equal or higher than 7.4

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Verify The SSSD Configuration File Exists
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The /etc/sssd/sssd.conf file should exist if it is in use.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Kernel Runtime Parameter IPv6 Check
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Disables IPv6 for all network interfaces.

ns3:criteria.comment: IPv6 disabled or net.ipv6.conf.all.disable_ipv6 set correctly

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: UEFI system boot mode check
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Check if system boot mode is UEFI.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Test for 64-bit Architecture
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Generic test for 64-bit architectures to be used by other tests

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Test for aarch_64 Architecture
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Generic test for aarch_64 architecture to be used by other tests

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Test for PPC and PPCLE Architecture
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Generic test for PPC PPC64LE architecture to be used by other tests

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Test for x86 Architecture
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Generic test for x86 architecture to be used by other tests

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Test for x86_64 Architecture
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: Generic test for x86_64 architecture to be used by other tests

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Mount Remote Filesystems with nodev
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The nodev option should be enabled for all NFS mounts in /etc/fstab.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Mount Remote Filesystems with noexec
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The noexec option should be enabled for all NFS mounts in /etc/fstab.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Mount Remote Filesystems with nosuid
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The nosuid option should be enabled for all NFS mounts in /etc/fstab.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Package nss-pam-ldapd Removed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The DPKG package nss-pam-ldapd should be removed.

ns3:metadata.ns3:title: Package samba-common Installed
ns3:metadata.ns3:description: The DPKG package samba-common should be installed.

ns6:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Checks usage of unauthenticated in apt.conf
Checks usage of unauthenticated in apt.conf.d/*
Tests the value of the insecure locks in /etc/exports
check for sec=krb5i or sec=ntlmv2i in /etc/fstab
check for sec=krb5i or sec=ntlmv2i in /etc/mtab
Tests the value of the PermitEmptyPasswords[\s]*(<:nocomment:>*) setting in the /etc/ssh/sshd_config file
Tests the value of the RhostsRSAAuthentication[\s]*(<:nocomment:>*) setting in the /etc/ssh/sshd_config file
Tests the value of the PermitRootLogin[\s]*(<:nocomment:>*) setting in the /etc/ssh/sshd_config file
Tests the value of the IgnoreUserKnownHosts[\s]*(<:nocomment:>*) setting in the /etc/ssh/sshd_config file
Tests the value of the Banner[\s]+/etc/issue setting in the /etc/ssh/sshd_config file
tests the value of X11Forwarding setting in the /etc/ssh/sshd_config file
Tests the value of the ClientAliveCountMax setting in the /etc/ssh/sshd_config file
Checks if pam_faillock authfail is hit even if pam_unix skips lines by defaulting, and also authfail deny value
Checks if pam_faillock authfail is hit even if pam_unix skips lines by defaulting, and also authfail deny value
Check pam_faillock.so preauth silent present, with correct deny value, and is followed by pam_unix.
Check control values of pam_unix, that it is followed by pam_faillock.so authfail and deny value of pam_faillock.so authfail
Check if pam_faillock.so is called in account phase before pam_unix
Check pam_faillock.so preauth silent present in /etc/pam.d/password-auth, has correct deny value, and is followed by pam_unix
Check pam_faillock authfail is present after pam_unix, check pam_unix has proper control values, and authfail deny value is correct.
Check if pam_faillock_so is called in account phase before pam_unix.

ns6:variable_test.comment: There should not exist duplicate user name entries in /etc/passwd
The value of PASS_MAX_DAYS should be set appropriately in /etc/login.defs
The value of PASS_MIN_DAYS should be set appropriately in /etc/login.defs
The value of PASS_MIN_LEN should be set appropriately in /etc/login.defs
The value of PASS_WARN_AGE should be set appropriately in /etc/login.defs

ns6:textfilecontent54_test.comment: make sure nullok is not used in /etc/pam.d/system-auth
test that there are no accounts with UID 0 except root in the /etc/passwd file

ns6:variable_test.comment: <0, UID_MIN - 1> system UIDs having shell set
<0, SYS_UID_MIN> system UIDs having shell set
<SYS_UID_MIN, SYS_UID_MAX> system UIDS having shell set

ns7:file_test.comment: Check if there aren't directories in root's path having write permission set for group or other

ns6:textfilecontent54_test.comment: remote server to send audit records
check for iommu=force in /etc/default/grub via GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX
check for fips=1 in /etc/default/grub via GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_DEFAULT

ns7:file_test.comment: System log files are owned by root group
System log files are owned by root
Permissions of system log files are correct

ns6:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Tests the presence of daily setting in /etc/logrotate.conf file
Tests the existence of /etc/cron.daily/logrotate file (and verify it actually calls logrotate utility)
Ensures system configured to export logs to remote host
Ensures system configured to export logs to remote host
ipv6 disabled any modprobe conf file

ns7:file_test.comment: system.map files readable only by root

ns6:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure /var/tmp is configured to bind mount to /tmp
Ensure bind mount option is on /var/tmp

ns8:partition_test.comment: Ensure /var/tmp and /tmp have the same source device

ns6:variable_test.comment: McAfee AntiVirus definitions have been updated

ns8:systemdunitproperty_test.comment: Test that the auditd service is running
Test that the cron service is running
Test that the ntp service is running
Test that the rsyslog service is running
Test that the sshd service is not running
Test that the syslogng service is running

ns7:sysctl_test.comment: kernel runtime parameter fs.protected_hardlinks set to 1
kernel runtime parameter fs.protected_symlinks set to 1
kernel runtime parameter fs.suid_dumpable set to 0
kernel runtime parameter kernel.dmesg_restrict set to 1
kernel runtime parameter kernel.kptr_restrict set to 1
kernel runtime parameter kernel.perf_cpu_time_max_percent set to 1
kernel runtime parameter kernel.perf_event_max_sample_rate set to 1
kernel runtime parameter kernel.perf_event_paranoid set to 2
kernel runtime parameter kernel.pid_max set to 65536
kernel runtime parameter kernel.randomize_va_space set to 2
kernel runtime parameter kernel.sysrq set to 0
kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.ip_forward set to the appropriate value
kernel runtime parameter net.ipv6.conf.all.disable_ipv6 set to 1
kernel runtime parameter vm.mmap_min_addr set to 65536

ns6:textfilecontent54_test.comment: CPE vendor is 'fedoraproject' and 'product' is fedora

ns6:family_test.comment: Test installed OS is part of the unix family
installed OS part of unix family
installed OS part of unix family
installed OS part of unix family
installed OS part of unix family
installed OS part of unix family

ns6:variable_test.comment: Verify if Profile set Value sshd_required as not required
Verify if Profile set Value sshd_required as required
Verify if Value of sshd_required is the default

ns6:textfilecontent54_object.comment: Get number of lines pam_unix defaults to
Get number of lines pam_unix defaults to

ns7:file_object.comment: root's path directories with wrong group / other write permissions

ns6:textfilecontent54_object.comment: ipv6 disabled any modprobe conf file
look for the partition mount point in /etc/mtab
look for the partition mount point in /etc/mtab

ns8:systemdunitproperty_object.comment: Retrieve the ActiveState property of auditd
Retrieve the ActiveState property of cron
Retrieve the ActiveState property of ntp
Retrieve the ActiveState property of rsyslog
Retrieve the ActiveState property of sshd
Retrieve the ActiveState property of syslogng

ns6:textfilecontent54_state.comment: upper bound of ClientAliveInterval in seconds
lower bound of ClientAliveInterval in seconds

ns7:file_state.comment: group or other has write privilege

ns8:systemdunitdependency_state.comment: auditd listed at least once in the dependencies
auditd listed at least once in the dependencies
cron listed at least once in the dependencies
cron listed at least once in the dependencies
ntp listed at least once in the dependencies
ntp listed at least once in the dependencies
rsyslog listed at least once in the dependencies
rsyslog listed at least once in the dependencies
sshd service is not listed in the dependencies
sshd socket is not listed in the dependencies
syslogng listed at least once in the dependencies
syslogng listed at least once in the dependencies

ns3:local_variable.comment: Regex containing skipped lines
Regex containing skipped lines

ns3:external_variable.comment: number of failed login attempts allowed

ns3:local_variable.comment: Count of all username rows retrieved from /etc/passwd (including duplicates if any)
Count of unique username rows retrieved from /etc/passwd
The value of last PASS_MAX_DAYS directive in /etc/login.defs
The value of last PASS_MIN_DAYS directive in /etc/login.defs
The value of last PASS_MIN_LEN directive in /etc/login.defs
The value of last PASS_WARN_AGE directive in /etc/login.defs

ns3:external_variable.comment: password expiration warning age in days

Value of last UID_MIN from /etc/login.defs
Construct (x - 0) * (x - (UID_MIN - 1)) expression
Value of last SYS_UID_MIN from /etc/login.defs
Value of last SYS_UID_MAX from /etc/login.defs
Construct (x - 0) * (x - SYS_UID_MIN) expression
Construct (x - SYS_UID_MIN) * (x - SYS_UID_MAX) expression

$IncludeConfig value converted to regex
Locations of all rsyslog configuration files concatenated into string
Locations of all rsyslog configuration files as collection
File paths of all rsyslog configuration files

Source device of /var/tmp
Age of file for each McAfee definition file.
